story_27_52000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Ugh... I’ve been stuck stewing here so long, I’m
starting to dredge up the past.
story_27_52000/2401_1001_0200_10:
This is all your fault, you know! You just had to
go and get yourself kidnapped by those fools,
didn’t you!
story_27_52000/2401_1001_0300_10: Tch. Nothing to say for yourself, huh?
story_27_52000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Those buffoons must have worked you hard to
have stamped out that eternal cheekiness of yours.
story_27_52000/2401_1001_0500_10:
I won’t feel sorry for you! It’s your own fault for
letting them capture you!
story_27_52000/2401_1001_0700_10:
S-seriously! You won’t get any sympathy from
me! If you hadn’t disobeyed me and run off
unprotected, this never would have happened.
story_27_52000/2401_1001_0800_10: But no—you never listen to a word I say!
